attributes.action: Thatcher to pay back £535,000 earnt for ex-PM duties
attributes.additional_details:
Former Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher has claimed £535,000 of taxpayers' money over the last five years, government records show.

This is absolutely ridiculous, as it is for all of the Prime Ministers earning money through these expenses. Isn't the country meant to be in debt? This can't help. Ordinary people don't get paid for a job they did 20 years ago.
